###- Server & Steam Ports - DO NOT EDIT
server_port 25001
steam_communications_port 8700
steam_query_port 27000


server_name * Lord | Sky War Event | Public Event
server_region usa
server_admin_password __ADMIN_PASSWORD__
# server_password 123

## Discord logs
discord_webhook_warning_id __DISCORD_ID__
discord_webhook_warning_token __DISCORD_TOKEN__
discord_webhook_banmute_id __DISCORD_ID__
discord_webhook_banmute_token __DISCORD_TOKEN__

###- Server Intro Message
server_welcome_message Welcome! Thank you for joining, please follow the server rules.
server_intro_title Welcome!
server_intro_body - For flying ship, make sure you have defined keybinds in your game settings.<br>- Enjoy WW1 weapons on all classes.<br>- Make sure you slow down the ship to be able to shoot with guns easily. <br><br>Community server from the <b>Lord</b> regiment.<br><br>Please report any issue to the discord <br><br><u>https://dsc.gg/lords-holdfast</u><br><br>Thank you.


###- Bandwidth & Performance Settings
network_broadcast_mode LowBandwidth

###- Player Population Settings

population_low_min_players 15
population_medium_min_players 50
population_high_min_players 80

###- Global Gameplay & Map Settings

artillery_fieldgun_respawn_timer 120
artillery_rocketlauncher_respawn_timer 120

map_voting_enabled false

###- Map Rotations

#--- POPULATION: HIGH, DAY --- 

!map_rotation start

import ship-round-setting.txt
import floating-fort.txt

map_name_override Floating Fort (Day)
population_verylow_playable false
population_low_playable false
population_medium_playable false
population_high_playable true

ships_spawn Frigate50gun 2 British 0
ships_spawn Frigate50gun 2 French 4
ships_spawn Schooner8gun 1 British 0
ships_spawn Schooner8gun 1 French 4
ships_spawn Schooner2gun 0 British 0
ships_spawn Schooner2gun 0 French 4
ships_spawn Rocketboat 0 British 0
ships_spawn Rocketboat 0 French 4
ships_spawn Gunboat 0 British 0
ships_spawn Gunboat 0 French 4

nature_preset none

!map_rotation end

#--- [MELEE] POPULATION: ANY ---
!map_rotation start
import melee-round-setting.txt
import melee-arena.txt
map_name_override Sky Melee Arena
!map_rotation end

#--- POPULATION: HIGH, NIGHT --- 
!map_rotation start

import ship-round-setting.txt
import floating-fort.txt

map_name_override Floating Fort (Night)
population_verylow_playable false
population_low_playable false
population_medium_playable false
population_high_playable true

ships_spawn Frigate50gun 2 British 0
ships_spawn Frigate50gun 2 French 4
ships_spawn Schooner8gun 1 British 0
ships_spawn Schooner8gun 1 French 4
ships_spawn Schooner2gun 0 British 0
ships_spawn Schooner2gun 0 French 4
ships_spawn Rocketboat 0 British 0
ships_spawn Rocketboat 0 French 4
ships_spawn Gunboat 0 British 0
ships_spawn Gunboat 0 French 4

nature_preset Ocean_Dark_Night

!map_rotation end

#--- [MELEE] POPULATION: ANY ---
!map_rotation start
import melee-round-setting.txt
import melee-arena.txt
map_name_override Sky Melee Arena
!map_rotation end

#--- Floating fort (all small ships) ---

!map_rotation start

import ship-round-setting.txt
import floating-fort.txt

map_name_override Floating Fort (Night)
# population_verylow_playable true
# population_low_playable true
# population_medium_playable false
# population_high_playable false


ships_spawn Frigate50gun 0 British 0
ships_spawn Frigate50gun 0 French 0
ships_spawn Schooner8gun 0 British 0
ships_spawn Schooner8gun 0 French 0
ships_spawn Schooner2gun 2 British 0
ships_spawn Schooner2gun 2 French 0
ships_spawn Rocketboat 0 British 0
ships_spawn Rocketboat 0 French 0
ships_spawn Gunboat 4 British 0
ships_spawn Gunboat 4 French 0

# nature_preset Ocean_Dark_Night

!map_rotation end
